original_text: And he heard the words of Laban's sons, saying, Jacob hath taken away all that was our father's; and of that which was our father's hath he gotten all this glory.
korean_text: 야곱이 라반의 아들들이 하는 말을 들은즉 야곱이 우리 아버지의 소유를 다 빼앗고 우리 아버지의 소유로 말미암아 이 모든 재물을 모았다 하는지라

sentences.original_text: And he heard the words of Laban's sons
Jacob hath taken away all that was our father's
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 우리 아버지의 모든 것을 빼앗아 갔고

sentences.original_text: and of that which was our father's
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리 아버지 것이었던 것 중에서

sentences.original_text: hath he gotten all this glory
